aws.description: A mapping of OCI account configuration.

connection.description: A Relay OCI connection to use

keyContent.description: Key Content of the OCI private API key

fingerprint.description: Fingerprint of the OCI private API key

region.description: The OCI region to use (for example, eu-frankfurt-1)

instanceIDs.description: The list of OCI instance IDs identifying the instances to reboot.

GracefulStop.description: Enable to Gracefully stop the instance by sending a shutdown command to the operating system.
